techmeme.title: CoinGecko: crypto trading volume on India's four largest exchanges more than doubled QoQ to $1.9B in Q4 2024, as many young Indians trade to supplement income (Jaspreet Kalra/Reuters)

New York's law requiring ISPs to offer $15 or $20/month broadband has inspired Vermont, Massachusetts, and California to guarantee affordable internet access (Jon Brodkin/Ars Technica)
Sources: Indonesia and Apple agree a deal to lift the iPhone 16 ban, with Apple set to invest $1B; a memorandum of agreement may be signed this week (Faris Mokhtar/Bloomberg)
Sources: left-leaning staff at Meta, Apple, Google, and Amazon mostly stayed silent on their CEOs attending Trump's inauguration due to a less secure job market (Financial Times)
